sentences.english: Almost half of all stillbirths, 1.2 million, happen when the woman is in labour.
sentences.chinese: 所有死產中，有近半數即120萬發生在分娩過程中。

sentences.english: It also can cause miscarriages and stillbirths in pregnant women.
sentences.chinese: 它同時還能使懷孕婦女出現流產或死產的情況。

sentences.english: The ratio of the stillbirth and the early neonatal death de creased one stage by one stage.

sentences.english: A miscarriage during the last three months of pregnancy is called "stillbirth".
sentences.chinese: 在妊娠最後三個月期間的自然流產稱爲“死產”。

sentences.english: Mexico has halved its rate of stillbirths in that time.
sentences.chinese: 墨西哥的死產率也在同期下降了一半。
